AN OPEN LETTER

TO MATT MULLENWEG

September 17, 2025

Hi Matt,

I will get straight to it. I have been building with WordPress for many years and I am passionate about creating fast, thoughtful block themes that help people share ideas and tell stories. I created the site you are on now last night using the block editor especially for this letter.

Lately I have applied to several openings at Automattic and each time I receive a same day rejection email with no opportunity for a chat or interview. The most recent role I applied for was a position focused on quickly producing block theme websites for customers, which is exactly the kind of work I want to do.

I respect that hiring at scale is difficult and that many strong candidates apply. I am writing because Automattic is where I want to be and I would welcome even a short conversation to show my work, hear feedback, and explore whether there might be a fit. If there is someone on your team who reviews these roles and portfolios, I would be grateful for a pointer.

Thank you for creating and guiding an ecosystem that keeps WordPress alive and useful for so many people. I appreciate your time and any advice you can offer.

Warmly,

Billy Wilcosky

wilcosky.com
